short_summary: Elevator Servicing and Maintenance for Canadian Forces Base Comox
description: Detailed Description of Request for Proposals. The brief overview of the project including service and maintenance descriptions has been mentioned above, however, detailed description is required to be mentioned here. The details of the project that the contractor should perform including but not limited to equipment services and installation will be published here in applicants guide.
duration_in_months: This Tender is an open competition for the selection of the best value solution.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: W6862-230129**
=============================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to bid on the **W6862-230129 Elevator Inspection, Maintenance, and Repair** tender.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Reference Number:** WS3897699278
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3897699278
*   **Publication Date:** March 1, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 26, 2023, at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 1, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2026

**Tender Description**
-------------------

The contractor will be responsible for providing elevator servicing, including preventative maintenance and repair at Canadian Forces Base Comox in Lazo, British Columbia. The scope of work includes elevator maintenance for:

*   One (1) passenger elevator in the Control Tower (B-239)
*   One (1) passenger and two (2) freight elevators in Hangar 7 (H-7)
*   One (1) dumbwaiter elevator in the Mess Hall (B-105)
*   One (1) passenger elevator in 14 Hangar
*   Two (2) passenger elevators at the Medical Clinic (B-309)

**Contract Requirements**
----------------------

The contractor must provide all necessary labour, materials, equipment, supervision, and transportation to complete the work.

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

**Eligibility**
-------------

All tenderers must be in good standing with the Government of Canada and comply with the terms and conditions of the tender.

**Responding to this Tender**
---------------------------

The tender package can be accessed through the [Ariba Discovery website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15567223?extsite=MTU1NjcyMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). For any questions or concerns, please contact Tian Lam at [tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to reject any tender, or
